author: rdelliga
body:
PR description:
This PR used the alignment in sigmat0 and sigmat0Safe for good PID in TOFPIDProducer (PR #45279) [1] to fix nonPID definition for good pions in Primary4DVertexValidation class; moreover, update a few Mtd tracks plots in the validation.

PR validation:
The code was tested on the workflow TTbar_PU_14TeV (100 events)
title: Sigmat0 and sigmat0Safe used to fix nonPID definition for good pions in MtdValidation
